content: Improve the answer saying yes we have applied with the ESP but not for an event of this magnitudeHave you previously applied to ESP with this same idea or project?\*Has anything changed? If you're considering reapplying, we recommend signing up for Office Hours first before restarting the application process.This is the first time we applied for an IRL event of this magnitude! In the past, we applied to host events during The Merge, we hosted 3 events in 3 different cities for 80-100 people each one.
